summary: Restore all Health, Stamina and Magicka while transform into an Werewolf (Beastform)
descriptionHtml:
I made this mod after an Request.
So what does it do?

This is a small Mod i made, it makes your Werwolf immune while transformating and restore your Health, Stamina, Magicka.

The only change i made are RestoreHealthFFSelf and RestoreStanimaFFSelf Duration able, and then i put the Restore Magicka, Health and Stamina in the Transformingspell make it for 8 seconds and up to 5000 (should be enough).

Installation:
Simple, put \"WerewolfTransformImunMod.esp\" it into Skyrim/Data - Folder and activate it.

Uninstallation:
Even more Simple, delete the File \"WerewolfTransformImunMod.esp\"

Compatibility
This Mods edit the RestoreHealhtFFSelf, ...MagickaFFSelf, ...StanimaFFSelf and but the 3 Effects to the Transformations Beastform, but it should be quit compatibility.

Bug
None Bugs fund, but no longterm testing!

If you would rate my \"Work\" or leave a Comments it would be great, if you find any Bug please tell me. If you want to edit this or use it in other Mods, give me Credits and a link to your new Mod, more i don\'t need.

Sorry for my bad English, normaly i speak German.

Other Mods:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21965 - Vampire Immune Mod
author: Niak
